message.body: Hey did you notice if the brakes on my truck were acting up when u drove it
Hey nothing seemed wrong to me but I don't had a point of reference
Ok good, the brake line is leaking I think, I was just trying to figure out for how long. Glad it was good for you.
I hope that is an easy fix! I loved driving it and the trip with it has made the apartment *so much* better
Me too, glad it worked out for you
